metadata.name: Flipped The Rabbit Year - HNY2023
metadata.description:
Experience the Flipped Face perspective and embrace the simplicity of every day, even on special occasions like the New Year. In many cultures, this year is known as the Year of the Rabbit, and we invite all those involved in this impressive arts piece to embrace the spirit of the R-A-B-B-I-T: 
Recognition, Adorable, Best, Brilliant, Impressive, and Talented. 

May you jump over every obstacle and make the most of each simple day.
